reference.title: Android App Validator preferences - Devices tab
reference.shortdesc: Allows you to specify which devices, if any, an app should be validated against when the Android App Validator is run.

refbody.section: The list box on this tab lists all devices for which validation criteria is known. By default, all devices are selected, meaning that when the App Validator is run it will validate the app against all of the listed devices. If you don't intend your app to run on certain devices (tablets, for instance, or small-screen devices) you can clear the appropriate checkboxes to prevent the App Validator from generating error or warning messages for those devices. Note that although the device list is initially sorted by device name, you can click the Screen Size or Pixel Density column headings to sort the list by the selected criteria, making it easier to select or eliminate devices by their screen specifications. Finally, note the Select/deselect all control beneath the list, which allows you to quickly select or clear the list of devices for which the app will be validated.
